page.title: 05A Day in the Life of a Vet.
page.content: 6.00 a.m. Get up to get things ready for surgery. 7.30 a.m. Gets ready and has breakfast. 8.30 a.m. People bring their animals to be spay , castrated etc. , etc. 9.00 a.m. Does operations. 10.00 a.m. Has a break. 10.30 a.m. Does paper work and invoices. 11.30 a.m. Goes on calls to farms and to people's houses who can't get to surgery. 12.30p.m. Has lunch. 01.30p.m. Does more paper work. 02.15p.m. More calls. 03.15p.m. Short surgery. 04.15p.m. People come to collect their animals. 06.00p.m. Evening surgery. 08.00p.m. On call for rest of night.
